component.name: BrowserOS
component.summary: The open-source Agentic browser powered by AI

description.p: BrowserOS is an innovative web browser that integrates AI agents directly into your browsing experience. Built on Chromium, it provides advanced AI-powered features while maintaining compatibility with existing web technologies.

ul.li: Built-in agent framework for web interactions

description.p: This is a community package of BrowserOS and not officially supported by BrowserOS AI.

screenshot.caption: Use LLM to summrize or navigate the web for you
Included MCP, so your agents can control the browser!

ul.li: **OpenAI-compatible provider support** — You can now connect any OpenAI-compatible API endpoint in providers.
**Multi-window & multi-profile agent support** — Agent now works smoothly across multiple windows and browser profiles, with affinity to the profile/window where it was started.
**MCP server reliability** — Fixed connection drops and improved stability.
**Agent reliability improvements** — General stability fixes to make the agent more reliable.
